admst:when.test: [name='abs' or name='acos' or name='asin' or name='atan' or name='acosh' or name='asinh' or name='atanh' or name='cos' or name='cosh' or name='exp' or name='limexp' or name='\$limexp' or name='ln' or name='log' or name='sin' or name='sinh' or name='sqrt' or name='tan' or name='tanh']
[name='add' or name='atan2' or name='div' or name='hypot' or name='max' or name='min' or name='mult' or name='pow']

variable: unexpeccted instance dependency in model initialization.\n

node: module node not expected, %(name).\n

%(name): second argument is not a probe\n

not fixed during processing for some reason. Exiting.\n

admst:fatal.format: function: argument of %(name) not a model/instance parameter.\n

%(name): should have one or two arguments\n

init:variables: variable %(name) set in both model and instance initialization blocks.\n

[parametertype='instance' and scope!='global_model' and scope!='global_instance' and not(nilled(attribute))]
[parametertype='instance' and scope!='global_model' and scope!='global_instance' and nilled(attribute)]
